security: Releasing the name of a DOD-affiliated personnel and the details of a minor traffic violation could compromise privacy.
summary: An identification form from INSCOM/CSF regarding David Reed Fromer, documenting a traffic violation in 1942.
summary_one_paragraph: This document is an identification form from INSCOM/CSF dated January 20, 1998, concerning David Reed Fromer. It references a record from the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations and notes a traffic violation: a stop sign violation and no current operator's license in 1942. The disposition of the case resulted in fines of $10.00, $5.00, and $30.00.
title: [ RESTRICTED ]
